{"id":711896694,"lang":"cpp","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1654071179,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"55 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/711896694/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"90.4 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    double findMedianSortedArrays(vector<int>& nums1, vector<int>& nums2) {\n    double ans=0;\n    vector<double> v;\n\n    v.insert(v.begin(),nums1.begin(),nums1.end());\n    v.insert(v.end(),nums2.begin(),nums2.end());  \n        sort(v.begin(),v.end());\n    // for(int i=0;i<v.size();i++){\n    //     cout<<v[i]<<\" \";\n    // }\n\n    if(v.size()%2==0){\n        ans=(v[v.size()/2]+v[(v.size()/2)-1])/2;\n        // cout<<v[v.size()/2]<<\" \"<<v[(v.size()/2)-1]<<\" \";\n    } else{\n        ans=v[v.size()/2];\n    }\n\n    return ans;\n    \n    }\n    \n\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays"}
